xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/549083-A Virgin's Shroud 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nI56x1WDb1LxfFRCuk8wikaXbAP.jpg Rasty and her friends, Smitha, Debby, Marchel, Harry, and Dhana, try to make a video clip of her at a train station. While editing the video, they see a strange apparition in the footage. When they go back to the station to make a documentary, they start being haunted. They are advised to tear the shroud of a dead virgin and set the cloth on fire to stop the haunting. With a help of Fikri, a police officer, Feli and Sarah set off to find that piece of fabric, and bring it to a railway carriage that is said to be haunted. A Virgin's Shroud
